entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Grand Rapids
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 23 January 2023
